org.grouplens.lenskit.data.pref

Interface IndexedPreference

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Preference

    public interface IndexedPreference
extends Preference
    A Preference that also provides 0-based indices for the user, item, and itself.
    Compatibility
    Public

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getIndex()
      Get the preference index.
      int getItemIndex()
      Get the item index.
      int getUserIndex()
      Get the user index.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.grouplens.lenskit.data.pref.Preference

        getItemId, getUserId, getValue

    • Method Detail

      • getIndex

        int getIndex()
        Get the preference index. Each indexed preference (within a given context, such as a PackedPreferenceSnapshot) has a unique, contiguous, zero-based index. This is to make it easy to store additional information related to preferences for efficient learning scenarios.
        Returns:
        The preference's index.

      • getItemIndex

        int getItemIndex()
        Get the item index. This is a zero-based index for the item, used for making item data easy to store in arrays.
        Returns:
        The item index.

      • getUserIndex

        int getUserIndex()
        Get the user index. This is a zero-based index for the user, used for making user data easy to store in arrays.
        Returns:
        The user index.
